name: cypress-automation
description: Cypress automation framework with Mochawesome reporting and Cucumber integration

scripts.clean: npm run clean:reports && npm run clean:artifacts
scripts.report: mochawesome-merge cypress/reports/mochawesome*.json > cypress/reports/combinedReport.json && marge cypress/reports/combinedReport.json --reportDir cypress/reports --inlineAssets true --showPassed true --showFailed true --showPending true --showHooks failed --reportTitle 'BlankFactor Test Report' --reportPageTitle 'BlankFactor Test Results'
scripts.full-test: npm run clean && npm run test:ci && npm run report

author: Fabian Correa
